overview:
Decision making and problem solving team leader in the world of Social Marketing and Community Development. Originally from New England now living in Los Angeles.

Director of Social Marketing for Method DRG. I create and build engaged communities in various social platforms in order to institute new branches of interaction between business and consumer. I am an expert in Microsoft Office Products (Excel, Word, PowerPoint). Along with a strong social/creative grasp on marketing I am very analytical by nature. I am always analyzing and manipulating data to optimize strategy.

milestones.description: Social Media Manager for Hello Music.  Created tremendous growth and engagement within the various social channels.
